Give your opinion on the subject matter.

Michael Jorden said he didnt want to alienate half of his fans ...to think of it, no main stream person was too political from pre 16 elections.  From what I remember, it started with that annoying white girl singer not coming out and saying she "stands with Hillary" when it seemed all of Hollywood had to chose a side.  I could be wrong with the timeline for the rest of the population, but that is when i noticed it.  All this madness should end soon.  The media has already given us a taste of Biden's term, they'll report on his socks while ignoring and suppressing all his 3rd party backroom deals.  Hell, the media has already gotten a ton of people into thinking that Obama's terms were sandal free as Snowden and Assange rot in other countries
You are a progressive American political commentator.

Im not a fan of Jake but if it's not true, then thats pretty stupid to put the blame on someone that was already hated. And again, it amazes me how Logan was able to find redemption even after he did that Japan forest video but Jake can't, even Logan doesn't get why Jake does this stuff.
